snippet: The president has faced searing public criticism since a raid left 44 police officers dead and put the country’s peace agreement with rebels in jeopardy.
abstract: Philippines' Pres Benigno S Aquino II accepts resignation of police chief Alan Purisima following raid on Moro Islamic Front rebels that led to deaths of 44 officers and drew widespread protests.
lead_paragraph: The president has faced searing public criticism since a raid left 44 police officers dead and put the country’s peace agreement with rebels in jeopardy.

headline.main: Philippine President Accepts Police Chief’s Resignation After Deadly Raid
